name: Militant Mage

grantsPowers.name: Warp Weapons
grantsPowers.description: Attack: Inflate Weapon Weight on Enemy Slash Hits

grantsPowers.name: Sword Ward
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Gain Slashing Resistance Over Time

description: The Militant Mage is known for their overzealous nature and the ability to pursue their purpose at all costs. Much like Hero, Militant Mages are often single-minded in their devotion to battle. They utilize slashing attacks and magical metal warping to advance their cause.
lore: I'm the best there is at what I do, but what I do best isn't very nice.
